answers.answer: Sooo annoying with my 2nd that happened to me except I failed the 3hr test by .1 so therefore was considered gestational I did the blood testing and diet change but never really believed I had it.  Anyways with this pregnancy they didn't even test me and just automatically said I was gestational only because I was with my 2nd..which annoyed me because no pregnancy is the same so how do they know unless they tested me...any who long story short I haven't been testing and just eat accordingly and making sure I'm eating proteins when I want my sugars

Hang in there just make sure when u go in for the 3hr test only eat something high in protein for breakfast ie a couple of eggs hopefully that will get u thru...that drink is disgusting just plug ur nose to avoid the taste (that's what I did)

For my 3 hour I was told not to eat from my physician. I felt like I was literally drinking a bag of sugar when I had to test.  I suggest drinking lots of water and nothing after 9pm. You will be fine. God bless.

question: I took my 1 hour gestational diabetes test and failed it with 1 point over, now I have to take the 3 hr test. I am pretty nervous about taking the test, can someone please give me some words of encouragement, and advice? I am not a fan of getting my blood drawn so much and more of that drink, cause I am nervous that I might get sick.
title: Gestational diabetes 3 hour test
